name: Marbloid (itch)
description:
Marbloid -- A game about guiding a little marble to a goal within the level, but instead of controlling the marble itself, the player controls the platforms.

This is my first (officially?) released prototype for a game idea I hand for a while.

Basic controls are explained in-game. You can press R/Y button on an Xbox controller to reset a level.

Recommended to paly with an Xbox Controller, but is fully playable with a keyboard.

Music by: Jammin' Sam Miller - Donkey Kong Country - Aquatic Ambience [Restored] (YouTube link)

Models by me made using Blender 2.92

If you encounter any bugs or issues, please report them in the comments.
